name: Trialect
tag_list: clinical-trials, physician, health-information-technology, healthcare, physician-development, social-network, platform
overview:
Trialect is the global platform for physician development.

Trialect addresses a few important gaps in the healthcare system that are contributing to physician dissatisfaction and growing attrition of healthcare force across the world. Participating in clinical trials and clinical research not only brings intellectual satisfaction to the physicians, but also ability to provide their patients with alternative treatment strategies, prestige, recognition and significant financial incentives. Thus, physicians, by contributing to clinical trials, are not only rewarding themselves intellectually, but also advancing the latest drugs to the mankind.

Trialect is for clinical research professionals and physicians to project their profiles for global visibility and actively participate in clinical trials and clinical research projects. Trialect platform is provided free of cost to the physicians

Trialect has an innovative model and helps accomplish 4 important functions: # Their profile gets global visibility to the investigators and Pharma across the world # Facilitates referral of patients from local physicians to trial center # Connects them with other trial investigators for streamlined information exchange. # Brings new clinical trial opportunities and funding from the pharma

Sai is the founder of Trialect, who attended Harvard Medical School before joining Amgen.
